messages.subject: Ashley
messages.msgSnippet: No one can take you off the list - you have to do that yourself under your Yahoo Groups preferences. ... From: Ashley Scholl To:
messages.messageBody:
No one can take you off the list - you have to do that yourself under your Yahoo Groups preferences.
----- Original Message -----
From: Ashley Scholl
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, April 30, 2003 5:51 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom]


please take me off the mailing list. I get 400-600emails a day. I have submitted a number of request to have this done. PLease let me know what I need to do to have this done.
Thanks
Ashley

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]


Yahoo! Groups Sponsor



~~~~ Don't forget! If you change topics, change the subject line! ~~~~

If you have questions, concerns or problems with this list, please email the moderator, Joyce Fetteroll (fetteroll@...), or the list owner, Helen Hegener (HEM-Editor@...).

To unsubscribe from this group, click on the following link or address an email to:

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Ashley
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well, I believe that the moderator or the list owner can, in fact, remove or unsubscribe people as part of managing the list. But, what a pain in the neck
messages.messageBody:
At 21:21 4/30/03 -0700, you wrote:
>No one can take you off the list - you have to do that yourself under your
>Yahoo Groups preferences.

Well, I believe that the moderator or the list owner can, in fact, remove
or unsubscribe people as part of managing the list. But, what a pain in the
neck for either of them to have to do. I mean, they have lives, too! It's
something that we folks can do ourselves much more easily, and, as Tia
rightly pointed out, folks seem to be able to get themselves
subscribed! It sure ain't all that hard to unsubscribe!

Just a-shakin' my head!

Marji


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
